effects.effect: Averages the user's unmodified Defense with the target's unmodified Defense; the value becomes the unmodified Defense for both Pok√©mon. Unmodified Special Defense is averaged the same way.
effects.shortEffect: Averages Defense and Special Defense with the target.

moveDescription:
The user employs its psychic power to average its
Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of the target.
